title: @KateyKhaos Zyra and Deep Sea Nami
body: KateyKhaos...I thought we had something special concerning Zyra's possible skins....I mean I LOVE Deep Sea Nami....but why do ya gotta do this to me T_T to us! TO ALL ZYRA MAINS WHY KATEYKHAOS WHY! I do love you and your work keep it up but but but but PLEASE PLEASE PLEAAAAASE! Zyra skin next and I will gift so many interweb hugs you will never wish to have a hug again >:D jk

replies.body: Gahhh, I'm sorry!  We do have her on the radar as a champion in need of a new skin, I swear! <3
Death Blossom Zyra or Atlantean Zyra!!!
IT'S OKAY I KNOW YOU ARE WORKING HARD AND WILL MAKE IT AN AMAZING SKIN I LOVE YOU KEEP UP THE GOOD WORK <3

Broadcast the amazing skin ideas across the entire building!  WOOOOOOOO!

https://i.imgur.com/1HvNiEO.png?noredirect
Zyra's skins take as much time as a Legendary skin due to her amount of models... so she'll get one whenever she gets one (kind of like any champ XD)
Yeah I know T_T but she needs one NOWWWWWWWWWW, NOWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWW! lol
ah i love zyra katey ill do what ever u want :~: just make it happen (gives cookies)
